articles.author: Dave McMenamin
articles.title: Murray dodges technical foul call after throwing heating pad - ESPN
articles.description: Denver Nuggets guard Jamal Murray should have been called for a technical foul after throwing a heating pad on the floor during a 106-80 Game 2 loss to the Minnesota Timberwolves, crew chief Marc Davis said Monday, but play continued without any whistle.
articles.content: DENVER -- Nuggets guard Jamal Murray should have been called for a technical foul -- but not ejected -- for throwing a heating pad on the floor during Denver's 106-80 Game 2 loss to the Minnesota Tim… [+3657 chars]
